title: Rath Yatra Preparations at Govardhan Peetham
description: Volunteers and artisans giving final touches to the grand chariots for the annual Rath Yatra festival.

title: Shankaracharya Offering Prayers to Lord Jagannath
description: Swami Nischalananda Saraswati performing special prayers inside the precincts of the ancient Jagannath Temple.

title: A Discourse on the Rig Veda
description: The Shankaracharya delivering a profound discourse on the hymns of the Rig Veda to an assembly of scholars and devotees.
